mapper.insert:
insert into ope_product_assembly (id, dr, product_id, assembly_b_id, assembly_id, inwh_status, product_name, product_serial_num, product_type, product_code, production_date, print_flag, revision, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, def1, def2, def3, def5, def6, `status`) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.dr}, #{item.productId}, #{item.assemblyBId}, #{item.assemblyId}, #{item.inwhStatus}, #{item.productName}, #{item.productSerialNum}, #{item.productType}, #{item.productCode}, #{item.productionDate}, #{item.printFlag}, #{item.revision}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updatedBy}, #{item.updatedTime}, #{item.def1}, #{item.def2}, #{item.def3}, #{item.def5}, #{item.def6}, #{item.status} )

insert into ope_product_assembly (id, dr, product_id, assembly_b_id, assembly_id, inwh_status, product_name, product_serial_num, product_type, product_code, production_date, print_flag, revision, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, def1, def2, def3, def5, def6, `status`) values (#{id}, #{dr}, #{productId}, #{assemblyBId}, #{assemblyId}, #{inwhStatus}, #{productName}, #{productSerialNum}, #{productType}, #{productCode}, #{productionDate}, #{printFlag}, #{revision}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def5}, #{def6}, #{status}) on duplicate key update id = #{id}, dr = #{dr}, product_id = #{productId}, assembly_b_id = #{assemblyBId}, assembly_id = #{assemblyId}, inwh_status = #{inwhStatus}, product_name = #{productName}, product_serial_num = #{productSerialNum}, product_type = #{productType}, product_code = #{productCode}, production_date = #{productionDate}, print_flag = #{printFlag}, revision = #{revision}, created_by = #{createdBy}, created_time = #{createdTime}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_time = #{updatedTime}, def1 = #{def1}, def2 = #{def2}, def3 = #{def3}, def5 = #{def5}, def6 = #{def6}, `status` = #{status}
